title: SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_RIM_COLLIDER_SIZE
content:
0xF380E184// SetVehicleWheelRimColliderSize
void SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_RIM_COLLIDER_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex, float value);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to obtain data for.wheelIndex: Index of wheel, 0-3.value: Size of rim collider.Not sure what this changes, probably determines physical rim size in case the tire is blown.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleWheelRimColliderSize
void SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_RIM_COLLIDER_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex, float value);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_RIM_COLLIDER_SIZE
SetVehicleWheelRimColliderSize(vehicle, 0, 0.0)
